_header: When eight days were all fulfilled
Subjects: sermon texts, Gospel; Circumcision, feast of
_description: Gospel, ‘In circumcisione domini’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: When aght daies war al fulfildeOf ihesu birth right als he wilde…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And in oure tung þat sauiowreVnto wham be euer honowre
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by the Latin, “Postquam impleti sunt dies octo.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: In circumcisione domini euangelium secundum Lucam (rubric, f. 27rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): I.247-250.
